content: उपस्थानं {@--1@} Presence, proximity, nearness. {@--2@} Approaching, coming, appearance, coming into the presence of; युगपदाचार्ययोरुपस्थानं <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--3@} ({%a%}) Worshipping, waiting upon (with prayers); attendance, service; सूर्योपस्थानात्प्रतिनिवृत्तं पुरूरवसं मामुपेत्य <ls>V. 1</ls>; सूर्यस्योपस्थानं कुर्वः <ls>V. 4</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 22</ls>, <ls n="Y.">3. 282.</ls> ({%b%}) Obeisance; greeting; °स्तोत्रपद्धतिं <ls>U. 1</ls> a form of congratulatory panegyric. {@--4@} Attending to, guarding; रावणहित° <ls>Mv. 5.</ls> {@--5@} An abode. {@--6@} The sanctuary, any sacred place (approached with respect). {@--7@} An assembly. {@--8@} Remembrance, recollection, memory; <ls>Y. 3. 160.</ls> {@--9@} Obtaining, getting.
